Air Jordan 30th

Description

When our attractive friends @ AKQA needed a high-touch, responsive, internationalized site built to tell the story of the 30th Anniversary of the Air Jordan sneaker, they gave us a call.

This experience tells the shoe‚Äôs making-of story and highlights NBA phenom Russell Westbrook... with beautiful animations... in nine languages... and no text orphans.
